description: An app privacy guide A simple Android app to help users understand the risks of giving apps dangerous permissions. What Privacy Helper brings is a simple, easy-to-use educational app with that leverages the mobile platform to inform and demonstrate effectively and interactively. Features: * Simple privacy quiz to test the user's privacy knowledge * Guide on data privacy, and the problem with Android * Guides on disabling permissions, unused apps, and other mitigations * Simple map demonstration of location tracking * List of dangerous permissions used by popular Android applications * Guide on Open Source app alternatives * List of alternative resources to help the user increase their knowledge * Sharing with popular platforms including Facebook, Twitter, and more
